take_match.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in all roles column (only for roles they have) for the corresponding matches.
take_match.not_taken_match_ids: As a __%1__, %2, those matches were **already taken**:
take_match.not_staff: You do not have any staff roles (Referee, Streamer...), so you cannot use this command.

take_match_as_referee.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in the Referee column for the corresponding matches.

take_match_as_streamer.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in the Streamer column for the corresponding matches.

take_match_as_commentator.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in the Commentator column for the corresponding matches.

drop_match.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of all roles column (only for roles they have) for the corresponding matches.

drop_match_as_referee.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of the Referee column for the corresponding matches.

drop_match_as_streamer.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of the Streamer column for the corresponding matches.

drop_match_as_commentator.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of the Commentator column for the corresponding matches.

player_match_notification.notification:
_ _
**__Match %1__
%2 vs %3**

__Referee:__ %4

This match will start in %5 minutes.

referee_match_notification.notification:
$./common

**%4, this match will start in \~6 hours and does not have any referee.**
If you want to take this match, please react with :muscle:
referee_match_notification.edited:
$./common

This match has been taken by %4.
